cost_functions.name: max_err_ddx_a_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddx_a_a - ddx_a_ex) ./ max( abs( ddx_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddx_a_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddx_a_b - ddx_b_ex) ./ max( abs( ddx_b_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddx_b_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddx_b_a - ddx_a_ex) ./ max( abs( ddx_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddx_b_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddx_b_b - ddx_b_ex) ./ max( abs( ddx_b_ex))
